articles.title: Mateusz Gamrot edges Arman Tsarukyan in back-and-forth UFC lightweight brawl
articles.description: Mateusz Gamrot edged Arman Tsarukyan by unanimous decision Saturday night in a fast-paced bout between two of the UFC's top up-and-coming lightweights.
articles.content:
If Arman Tsarukyan vs. Mateusz Gamrot was a look into the future of the UFC lightweight division, then that future looks awfully bright.

articles.title: Ashley Sanchez steps up as USWNT learns to win without Catarina Macario
